div.h2: We Provide High-Quality, Cost-Saving Surgical Solutions.
div.p: SPS is a leader in providing cost-saving solutions for healthcare facilities across the United States who choose to save money without sacrificing quality of care. We accomplish this by presenting hospitals and surgery centers with two ways to save on their high-volume surgical disposables.

SPS provides a liquidation solution for surgical disposables when they become non-moving and are no longer being used by the facility. This can be due to product conversions, contract changes, or physician departures. We purchase these surgical disposables that would otherwise remain un-used and eventually expire on the shelves of the OR, injecting cash directly into the hospital’s budget.

SPS acts as an independent distributor of un-used, in date surgical disposables. We sell the same high-volume products that your facility is currently buying from vendors, at an even greater discount than top tier pricing. We also provide the flexibility to purchase individual items in "eaches," rather than in cases, which helps in the unique case of a preferential product that is outside your normal buying patterns (Physician Preference Item)—and avoids disrupting any contract compliances.
OUR MISSION is to bring revenue back to hospitals for their surplus, un-used surgical products, while offering them discounts on high-volume products they are currently utilizing.
We have successfully eliminated hundreds of thousands of dollars from our customer’s costs by buying and selling the surgical surplus they would have otherwise thrown away.
WE PROVIDE PERSONALIZED SERVICE AT EVERY LEVEL

We cater our solution to serve the entire spectrum of healthcare facilities-from large health systems to small surgical centers. At each level, our services are personalized to fit our customers’ needs.
WE HELP YOU SAVE MONEY WITHOUT SACRIFICING QUALITY

Our business model allows our customers to save money, without interrupting surgeon preferences or hospital contracts. We accomplish this by providing hospitals, not one, but two cost-savings solutions for their high-volume surgical disposables.
WE INCREASE EFFICIENCY AND REDUCE WASTE
Our service keeps valuable medical devices from expiring on the shelf and turning into waste; allowing hospitals to redirect resources towards increasing their quality of care.
